about.details:
Paramatrix Technologies Limited was founded in 2004 and offers software applications and technology solutions for large and medium-sized companies.

The company's software applications and technology solutions (accelerators) can be broadly categorized as follows:

  • Digital transformation services: Application Development and Maintenance (ADM), Solution Architecture and Design, Enterprise Data Management & Data Analytics, INSIGHT (Accelerator for Analytics, MIS & Reporting), PERFORM (Accelerator for Employee Performance Management), EPPM (Enterprise Framework to manage Allocation and Scheduling of Work), PACE (Middleware Framework for Centralized Control), ITCS (Accelerator for managing Employees Share Trading Compliance), DROANA (Virtual Classroom Platform), EVENTJET (Event log monitoring & Management Solution), BULWARK (Cloud Security Posture Assessment), and PLAYMITY (SaaS-based Gamification Platform).
  • Managed services: Application Managed Services, Cyber Security Services, and Cloud & Data Support Services.

The company's client list includes the BFSI sector, retail, manufacturing, sports, pharma and logistics.

As of March 31, 2024, the company had 182 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Paramatrix Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Paramatrix Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 3076800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹33.84 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹110 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on August 27, 2024, and closes on August 30, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Paramatrix Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Paramatrix Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Paramatrix Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Paramatrix Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Paramatrix Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Paramatrix Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Paramatrix Technologies IPO opens on August 27, 2024 and closes on August 30, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Paramatrix Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Paramatrix Technologies IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Paramatrix Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Paramatrix Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Paramatrix Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Paramatrix Technologies IPO will be done on Monday, September 2, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 3, 2024. Check the Paramatrix Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Paramatrix Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Paramatrix Technologies IPO listing date is on Wednesday, September 4, 2024.
